title: B2B Source
description: This Data Type is used to capture B2B/CRM Source identifiers.

xdm:systemID.title: System ID
xdm:systemID.description: This is an identifier for the source system itself and potentially includes the object type.

xdm:ID.title: ID
xdm:ID.description: This is the row id for the fragment (of whatever type it is).It could be row id for the contact, account, lead etc.

xdm:key.title: System Key
xdm:key.description: This is concatination of systemId and id. The concatenated value is created by the connector in the data pipe, so itâ€™s already in the source.
